title: Show me English: a visit to the doctor [episode 5]
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Ministry of Education, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Study and teaching - Foreign speakers
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Tutors and tutoring
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diet
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Public health - Australia
description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. On the second visit to the doctor, Tina is given the result of her test and is prescribed medication and given advice on the importance of diet and rest. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
